Content: Brigadier Chula Abenayake, the newly-appointed General Officer Commanding (GOC) for 14 Division assumed duties on Monday (5) at the 14 Division Headquarters of the Security Force Headquarters – West (SFHQ- West) in Colombo. Amid ‘Seth Pirith’ chanting, he left his signature in an official document and symbolized the acceptance of his new office before he addressed all ranks serving the 14 Division. Representative Brigade Commanders, Commanding Officers, Officers and Other Ranks serving under 14 Division were associated with the occasion.
